title: Foundation: Degree in IT or Business
description: Start with a bachelor's degree. A degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or Software Engineering provides technical grounding, while a degree in Business Management provides a strong commercial foundation. Both are excellent starting points.

title: Entry-Level Role: Project Coordinator or Business Analyst
description: Begin your career in a role that supports the project management process. As a Project Coordinator, you'll handle administrative tasks, scheduling, and reporting. As a Business Analyst, you'll focus on gathering requirements and bridging the gap between business needs and the tech team.

title: Associate Project Manager & Certification
description: Move into an Associate Project Manager role with responsibility for smaller projects or modules of a larger project. This is the perfect time to get a globally recognized project management certification.
institutes: All major IT companies in Sri Lanka

title: IT Project Manager
description: As a Project Manager, you are fully responsible for planning, executing, and closing projects. You will manage the project scope, schedule, budget, and team to ensure successful delivery.

title: Senior Project Manager / Program Manager
description: Advance to a senior role where you manage multiple, related projects (a program) or handle large-scale, complex enterprise projects. This role involves more strategic planning and alignment with organizational goals.
